posts.name: AIDS Action Committee
posts.descr: Since 1993, Check-In volunteers have provided information and referrals, along with ,a sensitive and caring ear, to AIDS Action Committeeâ€™s clients, helping to maintain a strong connection between clients and staff members. Volunteers complement our services by helping clients work through problems and encouraging successes over the phone.
